title.rendered: Gottwals Books will be Closed July 4th

content.rendered: We will be closed tomorrow, July 4th in celebration of Independence Day! Thank you to all the men and women who fight to keep our country free. We appreciate you! We just received a huge shipment of inventory in our new Gottwals Books truck! Visit any store to find out what we are adding to our ever growing inventory.
